head.title: Welcome to the School District of Poynette

div.p: In the best interest of the health of our community, the School District of Poynette will be closing effective immediately Sunday, March 15, 2020. This closure will extend indefinitely; based off of Governor Evers' Executive Orders to DHS. Continue to watch for more detailed updates through email, our website and social media. Parents and students may pick-up learning materials from their school by making special arrangements with your building principals, call 608.635.4347. Bagged meals for our students are available for pick-up Mondays & Wednesdays. More information about registering and logistics for bagged meals can be located here.
